text: Popovo may refer to: *Popovo, Bulgaria, a town in Bulgaria *Popovo, Leningrad Oblast, a rural locality (a station settlement) in Leningrad Oblast, Russia *Popovo, Moscow Oblast, a rural locality (a village) in Moscow Oblast, Russia *Popovo, Novgorod Oblast, a rural locality (a village) in Novgorod Oblast, Russia *Popovo, Tver Oblast, a rural locality (a village) in Tver Oblast, Russia *Popovo (župa), medieval county in what is now Bosnia and Herzegovina ==See also== *Popov *Popovka (disambiguation) *Popowo (disambiguation)
title: Popovo
